name: Basic bread
description:
basic white bread,
perfect smell..perfect taste
ingredients: 125ml milk, preferably whole milk, plus extra for glazing ,7g fast-action dried yeast ,350g strong white bread flour, plus extra for dusting,50g caster sugar,1 egg,50g unsalted butter, softened and cut into cubesneutral-tasting oil, such as sunflower, for proving20g strong white bread flour60ml milk, preferably whole

name: cupcakes
description:
cup cakes 	with chocolate ships	perfect smell..perfect taste 
perfect smell..perfect taste
ingredients: 50ml rapeseed oil,1 tsp cider vinegar,200ml plant milk (we used oat),225g self-raising flour,½ tsp baking powder,150g golden caster sugar,2 tsp vanilla paste,200g vegan plant butter block, softened,2 tsp vanilla paste,400g icing sugar
